name: Baked Rhubarb Sauce
author: BigShotsMom
summary: I can't believe I didn't like this as a child! It cooks down to a sweet, tart, spicy sauce that can be eaten alone, mixed with oatmeal, served over ice cream, or to accompany pork. My daughter even spreads it on toast.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh rhubarb, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Place rhubarb in a casserole dish
Mix sugar, cinnamon, cloves, and salt together and sprinkle evenly over the rhubarb
Cover and bake in the preheated oven until rhubarb is soft, 30 to 45 minutes
Remove from oven and stir vigorously to break down rhubarb into a sauce
Serve warm, chilled, or at room temperature
